title: Weekly review. Ep. 382. This is the weather office
creator_credit: Stanhope Andrews, New Zealand National Film Unit and J.M.D. Hardwick
brief_description: The work of the weather office of New Zealand where, with the assistance of 120 reporting stations in New Zealand and on surrounding islands and reports from ships at sea, meteorological information is collated and from it the weather forecast is given.
